db:info.db:title: Twitter Timeline Example
db:info.db:edition: Qt Network Authorization | Commercial or GPLv3

db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates authenticating with OAuth to access a Twitter timeline.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT = core widgets network networkauth requires(qtConfig(tableview)) CONFIG -= app_bundle
HEADERS += \ twitter.h \ twittertimelinemodel.h
SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ twitter.cpp \ twittertimelinemodel.cpp
FORMS += \ twitterdialog.ui
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/oauth/twittertimeline INSTALLS += target
